name: v0.19.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "4d62589dc6a55e74bbe33930b826d593367fc777449a410604b2ad7c6c625ef7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.19.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/releases/download/v0.19.0/rules_jvm-v0.19.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```


## What's Changed
* Handle java_library being remapped with map_kind by @Ignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/199
* Fix Gazelle collision error format by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/201
* gazelle: Fail when errors occur by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/202
* test(gazelle): Use json instead of color logs by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/203
* gazelle: Sort suggestions by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/204
* Remove empty glob by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/200
* Avoid initialising classes when looking for tests by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/207
* Clear up a bunch of error handling code by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/209
* pmd: Broaden supported supported output formats by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/208


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.18.0...v0.19.0

name: v0.18.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",

    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/releases/download/v0.18.0/rules_jvm-v0.18.0.tar.gz",

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured

```


## What's Changed
* Added java_maven_repository_name directive by @Ignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/192
* Make JUnit5Runner usable with Early Access builds by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/194
* Fix the default config in `spotbugs_test` by @chrismgrayftsinc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/187
* junit5: pass static nested classes to the launcher by @gaurav-narula in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/195

## New Contributors
* @gaurav-narula made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/195

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.17.0...v0.18.0

## What's Changed
* build: Upgrade grpc-java to 1.56.1 and protobuf to 21.7 and ensure we choose the right version by @blorente in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/183
* Add javax.annotation.processing as in the stdlib by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/184
* fix: Reflect protobuf updates into MODULE.bazel by @blorente in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/185
* Add full JRE package list by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/186


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0

## What's Changed
* junit5: Print failure causes by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/175
* Fix `tools/update-dependencies.sh` by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/177
* Bump PMD version to last planned release (6.55.0) by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/178
* pass tag for java_test_lib by @lyao-77 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/179
* Add java_generate_proto directive by @meowcakes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/181
* Prepare for the next release by bumping deps by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/182

## New Contributors
* @lyao-77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/179
* @meowcakes made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/181

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0

body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "2b710518847279f655a18a51a1629b033e4406f29609e73eb07ecfb6f0138d25",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.13.0",

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

```


## What's Changed
* Don't tag builds as prereleases by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/166
* Support parallel test execution in the JUnit5 runner by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/169
* Fix Security Manager warning with Java 17 by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/171
* Replace ctx.host_configuration with ctx.configuration by @hanikesn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/173
* Add a bzlmod module definition by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/170
* Amend release workflow now we have bzlmod in the mix by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/174

## New Contributors
* @hanikesn made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/173

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.12.0...v0.13.0

name: v0.12.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "09c022847c96f24d085e2c82a6174f0ab98218e6e0903d0793d69af9f771a291",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.12.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/releases/download/v0.12.0/rules_jvm-v0.12.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```


## What's Changed
* Make the JUnit5 runner compatible with Java 8 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/134
* Ensure that sysout and syserr are escaped by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/161
* Add test sharding support to the JUnit 5 runner by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/162
* Use TestExecutionListener in shard test by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/164
* Expand on the ability to include the same test in two suites by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/165

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/134

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.11.0...v0.12.0

name: v0.11.0

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",

    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/releases/download/v0.11.0/rules_jvm-v0.11.0.tar.gz",

```


## What's Changed
* Simplify testdata lookup by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/159
* Look at annotations on method returns and params by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/160
* gazelle: Generate exports for non-private return types by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/158


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.10.0...v0.11.0

name: v0.10.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "d47f8869fb658973708167a8e65c0e117fa46cab93ed5e714468d6b2b2cce3c0",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.10.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/releases/download/v0.10.0/rules_jvm-v0.10.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix up junit reporting by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/108
* [junit5] Ensure that completely disabled test classes report their tests by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/110
* [junit5] Use the ServiceLoader to discover test engines by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/111
* Add a way to exclude maven artifacts from being resolved by @chrismgrayftsinc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/113
* [junit5] Fix serialization of illegal XML characters by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/114
* [junit5] Also filter dynamically registered tests by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/109
* Improve missing import error message by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/117
* Fix time attribute format in JUnit 5 test results by @hisener in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/116
* Add `.co` to list of common package prefixes by @robertgates55 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/118
* Avoid using the `maven` namespace by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/115
* Add `.me` to list of common package prefixes by @luangong in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/120
* fix(#104): Allow custom package prefixes by @hjellek in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/121
* fix(#104) Added documentation for package_prefixes for java_test_suit by @hjellek in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/122
* gazelle: Add support for rules_jvm_external v2 lockfile by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/127
* Add support for the Junit5 tags to limit tests withing a class by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/128
* Fully qualified static method calls by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/81
* Make sure docs are up to date by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/130
* Update Bazel version and rulesets to latest releases by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/119
* Do not fail the build if the security manager is disabled by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/132
* It is sometimes helpful to know how to generate the lint tests from outside contrib_rules_jvm by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/133
* Don't attempt to submit to a shut-down scheduler by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/138
* Revert "Fully qualified static method calls (#81)" by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/131
* release: publish release archive by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/137
* More support for java test suites. by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/135
* Identify fully-qualified types by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/139
* Blank out line numbers in test expectations by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/141
* Delete unused code by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/143
* Stop duplicating package name in errors by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/144
* Convert junit5 tests to be pure junit5 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/146
* Allow configuring engine filters by @marcphilipp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/106
* Run google-java-format by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/148
* Remove incorrect statics in imports by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/150
* Fix format by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/151
* Always simplify dep label in caller by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/147
* javaparser returns classes and packages separately by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/145
* Use sorted set instead of manual impl by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/142
* Fix test package by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/149
* Ignore inner classes' empty packages by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/152
* Gazelle flag to pass in maven_install path by @caseyduquettesc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/140
* Share default test file suffixes with java_test_suite by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/156
* feat(gazelle): Keep existing runtime_deps by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/157
* Test code more accurately detects dependencies by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/153

## New Contributors
* @chrismgrayftsinc made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/113
* @hisener made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/116
* @robertgates55 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/118
* @luangong made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/120
* @hjellek made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/121
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/137
* @marcphilipp made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/106
* @caseyduquettesc made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/140

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0

## What's Changed
* Upgrade `apple_rules_lint`, add `LintInfo` providers for linters by @blorente in #105
* Fix test filter greediness for method names by @rdesgroppes in #93


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```


## What's Changed
* Allow finding and processing a classname starting with an underscore by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/98
* Fix NPE when translating `null` exception messages to XML by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/96
* Avoid asking users to add things to their `maven` workspace by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/100
* checkstyle: Short timeout by default by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/101
* Support multiple classes and/or methods in filter by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/99
* Ensure that the release workflow generates correct release notes by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/102


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "eb4e9c2847b3044740e7e74d658381a06411bcba961ec1908dc2737de721238b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/archive/refs/tags/v0.6.0.zip",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```


## What's Changed
* gazelle: Fix deps ordering when using #keep by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/40
* Use rules_jvm_external install for package index by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/49
* Correct a typo in a function name by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/51
* Update the rules_jvm_external rules tp latest release  by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/52
* Flesh out tests for java_test and java_test_suite generation by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/50
* Add java_extension directive by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/53
* Fix up helper library generation by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/54
* Deduplicate and sort imports by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/55
* Fix up helper file deps by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/56
* Split proto generation into a separate java package by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/57
* Update bazel gazelle by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/59
* fix: Register missing known directive by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/60
* Reduce generate to a single codepath by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/58
* java_test_suite: Deduplicate dependencies by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/61
* feat(gazelle): Add resolution integration tests. by @blorente in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/62
* Delete non-server mode by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/63
* Use java tools parser by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/67
* Stop fetching output base by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/69
* Enforce format checks as part of CI by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/71
* Remove unused function by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/72
* Move filter-imports from wrapper binary to generate by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/73
* Remove obsolete resolves by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/76
* Migrate tests to use Gazelle's integration test runner by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/75
* Support junit4 and junit5 tests properly by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/77
* Allow setting test attributes based on annotations by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/78
* Remove unused function by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/74
* Report spotbugs issues to stderr not stdout by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/66
* Add three internal library prefixes to the stdLibPrefixes packages by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/82
* ParameterizedTest is still a junit5 test by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/80
* Add classifier support to maven targets by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/83
* Also detect JUnit Pioneer imports imply JUnit 5 by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/85
* Set the Java language level to 11 by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/87
* Remove duplication by making `java_test_suite` use `java_junit5_test` by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/88
* Avoid Java 17 printing a warning about the SecurityManager by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/89
* Suppress warnings about security manager on java 17 by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/90
* Add `junit-platform-suite` to runner filters by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/91
* Register super class to suppress warning (java 17) by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/92
* Add dynamic test results to XML output by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/94
* Generate test targets for _only_ separate tests by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/95
* Reworking Java server lifecycle management by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/70

## New Contributors
* @blorente made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/62

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "a939cd04da2deee16131898d91d8e23559dcd1a30a5128beac30a2b01b33c94f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/archive/v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```

To use the Gazelle plugin, please see [its README](java/gazelle/README.md)

## What's Changed

* Rules and macros
  * Skip JUnit 5 tests when assumptions are not met by @bonigarcia in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/37
  * Update the dependency versions for the lint tools by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/41
  * Allow setting visibility for java_test_suite libraries by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/44
* Gazelle Java build file plugin
  * Document configuration options by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/34
  * Use getQualifiedName by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/35
  * Only visit each ClassOrInterfaceType once by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/36
  * Add javax.xml as provided by JDK by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/38
  * Fix a resolve issue with gRPC by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/39
  * Include problematic package on error by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/42

## New Contributors
* @bonigarcia made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/37

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "79773625951a7a6dc0fc1636ef2388253b69a1e8109b34198c191953280648ab",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/archive/v0.3.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```

## Headline Features

This releases fixes a problem where Gazelle was required even if you didn't want to use the Gazelle plugin.

## What's Changed
* Add two missing archive dependencies used by external system  by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/28
* Update the dependencies for the Gazelle rules by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/30
* Expose freeze-deps as a buildable target by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/31
* Gazelle Java plugin
  * Only set --output_user_root in tests by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/24
  * Stringify labels in error by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/25
  * Implement proto reflection service by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/27
  * Narrow filtering of imports in modules by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/26

## New Contributors
* @illicitonion made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/24

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## Headline Features

* A [Gazelle Java plugin](https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/tree/main/java/gazelle) to make generating and maintaining build files for Java projects that little bit nicer!

## To Use

WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "5d9d466a5756bc4540a03e41afddf8769ea02927ec5efb820cfc551da08ce515",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/archive/v0.2.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```


## What's Changed
* Add `ai` to common package prefixes by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/14
* PMD: replace deprecated -filelist with --file-list by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/15
* PMD: fix other deprecated command line arguments by @rdesgroppes in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/16
* Update the freeze-deps.py to process compat-enabled repositories by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/17
* Add formatting script by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/20
* Add gazelle extension for Java by @stevebarrau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/19
* Regenerate readme prior to release by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/22

## New Contributors
* @rdesgroppes made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/14
* @tjoneslo made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/17
* @stevebarrau made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/20

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow `java_test_suite` to take a package name as an attribute by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/6
* Add data param to checkstyle_config and tests by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/9
* Allow the checkstyle binary to be configured by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/11
* Allow the spotbugs binary to be selected by the user by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/12
* Make PMD binary configurable by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/13

## New Contributors
* @thirtyseven made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/pull/9

## Usage
In your `WORKSPACE` file, add:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "f27b6a86481e78f659a5213978056aa88344041858548d76a1baba56a1e6048c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/archive/v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/compare/v0.0.1...v0.1.0

name: v0.0.1
body:
## What's Changed

First release! Features include:
    
* `java_test_suite` to generate test targets from a `glob` of sources.
* `java_junit5_test` to allow JUnit5 tests to be run. This is a drop-in replacement for `java_test`, and is integrated into `java_test_suite` if the `runner = "junit5"` attribute is set.
* Integation of [apple_rules_lint](https://github.com/apple/apple_rules_lint) providing linters for checkstyle, pmd, and spotbugs. This is done via macros for `java_library`, `java_test`, and `java_export`.

## Usage

In your `WORKSPACE` file, add:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "contrib_rules_jvm",
    sha256 = "39ddc3b35f42ca42fd7f9fc0d912d75201264f58aac3e37ed16cb4ed203654e2",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jvm-0.0.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/archive/v0.0.1.tar.gz",
)

# Fetches the contrib_rules_jvm dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:repositories.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_deps")

contrib_rules_jvm_deps()

# Now ensure that the downloaded deps are properly configured
load("@contrib_rules_jvm//:setup.bzl", "contrib_rules_jvm_setup")

contrib_rules_jvm_setup()
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_jvm/commits/v0.0.1
